statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM CustomerSegments WHERE behavior_score > 0.5
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM CustomerSegments ORDER BY segment_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, behavior_score FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_name = 'Premium'
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM CustomerSegments WHERE behavior_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, behavior_score FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT segment_name, AVG(behavior_score) AS avg_behavior_score FROM CustomerSegments GROUP BY segment_name;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_name LIKE 'V%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity FROM behavior_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE segment = 'VIP' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND segment = 'Premium';

SELECT customer_id, name, segment FROM customers LEFT JOIN behavior_data ON customers.customer_id = behavior_data.customer_id WHERE behavior_data.action = 'purchase' ORDER BY segment DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT segment) AS num_segments FROM customers;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM behavior_data;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_type FROM customers INNER JOIN behaviors ON customers.customer_id = behaviors.customer_id;
SELECT behavior_id, customer_name, behavior_date FROM behaviors INNER JOIN customers ON behaviors.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT behavior_id, segment_name FROM behaviors INNER JOIN customers ON behaviors.customer_id = customers.customer_id INNER JOIN segments ON customers.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE segment_id = 2 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE segment_id = 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, segment_name FROM customers JOIN segments ON customers.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM customers JOIN behaviors ON customers.customer_id = behaviors.customer_id WHERE behavior_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE segmentation = 'VIP';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(click_id) AS total_clicks FROM clicks GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE segmentation = 'Premium' ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT purchase_id, amount, purchase_timestamp FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_timestamp ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT c.customer_name, p.amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 AND customer_id < 200;
SELECT segment_name FROM segments WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_category, behavior_date FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, b.behavior_category FROM customers c JOIN behavior_data b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ch.campaign_name FROM customers c JOIN campaign_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id ORDER BY ch.campaign_date DESC;
SELECT cr.customer_id, cr.response_type, ch.campaign_name FROM campaign_responses cr JOIN campaign_history ch ON cr.campaign_id = ch.campaign_id WHERE cr.response_type = 'click' LIMIT 5;
